content.raw: About the missing propellers, it's a common problem with semi-transparent objects \(at least in ogre\). Semi-transparent objects are usually drawn after opaque objects. In this case, the engine does not know that the ocean is semi-transparent since we're setting the alpha value ourselves in the shaders. To workaround this, you can manually set its render queue, something like `this->data->planeEntity->setRenderQueueGroup(this->data->planeEntity->getRenderQueueGroup()+1);`
